answers.answer: As a proud mommy to three dachshunds, I'd take her to the vet.  If there is anything that dachshunds do it's EAT.  The first sign of trouble for dachshunds can often be a reduced appetite - that's how we found my (late) dachshund's diabetes.  Eight years old is about the time that they start to enter old age and, like us, their bodies start to break down.Hugs to you and your dachshund.

question: My dog is still eating, however, she is not eating as much as she used to. She otherwise doesn't seem sick. We recently moved to a new apartment, and I am wondering if that has something to do with it. She is an 8 yo dachshund. I normally feed her in the morning and by the evening she will have eaten all of her food. Now she only finishes half.Thanks for your help
title: My Dog is not eating very much
